content: materials yarn any cotton thread lace or fingering yarn and optioneel glitter thread held together size 10 thread lace weight of fingering yarn in the pattern 1 cotton thread - scheepjes maxi sweet treat 25 g/140 m and drops glitter silver 700 meters 10g hook 1 75 - 2 mm size 8 cm 2 fingering yarn - scheepjes catona hook 2 5 mm size 10 cm scissors tapestry needle to weave in ends you can use any similar yarn and suitable hook skill level intermediate
